```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(janitor)
library(broom)
library(stargazer)
library(GGally)
library(kableExtra)
library(effsize)
library(plotly)
```

```{r}
monolake <- read_csv(here("data", "mono_lake_annual_levels.csv"), skip = 5) %>% 
  clean_names() %>% 
  rename("lake_level" = "lake_level_feet_above_sea_level")
```

```{r}
area <- monolake %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = year, y = lake_level)) +
  geom_line()

area
```

```{r}
area <- ggplotly(area)

area
```
